title: yahoo62278
author: yahoo62278
created_time: October 03, 2022, 11:25:07 PMLast edit: December 27, 2022, 07:13:16 AM by yahoo62278
content: WINZ.IO is looking to advertise their casino and would like to hire 20-30 users from  Member to Legendary rank to help them out. Announcement Here is their announcement thread. Take a look at the site and if this is a project you would like to help out advertising for, then drop your application in here. Currently this will be a 4 week campaign with the possibility of running longer depending on the results.How to ApplyCode:Bitcointalk Username:Profile linkPost Count: ..... (including this one)btc addyForum RankCurrent MeritPayments if merit and post requirement metMember .001/wkFull member .002/wkSr .003/wkHero/Legendary .004/wkBONUSTop merit earner each week gets a .001 bonus on their pay, no matter your rankA week runs from Tuesday to Monday and is based on the UTC timezone. Posts after 23:59 UTC Monday will count for the next week.Payment will be credited every Tuesday.Spreadsheethttps://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1aHI0CWkmWy0vNm460TfnmpoSkabTLyK8ffyHWN_cklk/edit?usp=sharingRulesMust wear avatar Must make 25 quality posts per week to be paid4 posts per week must be in gambling sectionsmax 5 posts in local boards per week will countIf you do not usually post in the gambling section, do not apply for this campaign. Posts must be constructive and on topic125 characters minimumUsers not posting enough to qualify for weekly pay can be removed with no warningUsers must earn 1 merit per week to qualify for full payment. Not earning 1 merit minimum you can still earn half paymentBurstposting will not be toleratedNot completing all terms will result in not getting paid. Not getting enough posts, not getting merit, getting neg trust during campaign, erc.1 bitcointalk account per person(If you are found to be enrolling alts you and your alt are kicked out with no pay)If you receive neg trust while enrolled, the offense will be looked at and could disqualify you from being paid.You may not advertise any other sites in your signaturesPosts in any sig campaign or bounty threads will not count Users will not rank up unless I announce there is an available openingPosts in Games & Rounds, Off topic, Lending, Auctions, Tokens, or Archival will not count
